title: Agua Negra Marinade
ingredients: ¼ cup freshly squeezed lime juice
instructions: Combine all the ingredients using a whisk in a mixing bowl, making sure to break up any lumps of spices.  Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.
remarks: [By the author:]  “Besides being great on egg roll, soy sauce is one of those secret ingredients that chefs use to wake up the flavor of all kinds of food.  Agua Negra is great for basic backyard barbecued steaks, and chicken, too – just marinate 1 hour to overnight.  Thinly sliced flank steak, marinated in this sauce, grilled over charcoal, and served on a soft tortilla, with all the fixin’s, put Chevys’ steak fajitas on the map.”
source: Chevys [Restaurant] & Rio Bravo [Restaurant] Fresh Mex Cookbook, published by 10 Speed Press, Berkeley, Toronto © 2000 by Chevys Inc.
